name: Stellaron Hunter: Kafka
description: One of the Stellaron Hunters. A beautiful assassin wearing an enigmatic smile, she excels in manipulation and various weaponry. It was by her design that the Astral Express was led here, all of which was simply part of a certain plan...

skills.name: Midnight Tumult
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to one designated target, with a high chance to Shock the attacked target.

skills.name: Caressing Moonlight
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to one designated target and units adjacent to the target. If the primary target is Shocked, inflicts Shock on the secondary targets as well.

skills.name: Silent and Sharp Mockery
skills.description: Deals minor Lightning DMG to all targets.

skills.name: Spirit Whisper
skills.description: Has a high chance of causing one designated target to enter the "Dominated" state, then advances their action to immediately use their Basic ATK on a random ally of theirs.

skills.name: Seething Whisper of the Fallen
skills.description: Deals Lightning DMG to one designated target, with a high chance to Shock the attacked target. And at the same time, deals Lightning DMG to any other Shocked target.

skills.name: Psychological Suggestion
skills.description: Applies "Psychological Suggestion" to multiple targets, and adds "Revelation" onto the Action Order. The next time "Revelation" takes action, any targets with "Psychological Suggestion" will enter the "Dominated" state.

skills.name: Tremble
skills.description: If the attacked target is currently Shocked, immediately produce 1 instance of Shock DMG.

skills.name: Cruelty
skills.description: When friendly units (apart from Kafka) or "Dominated" targets attack the Shocked primary target, unleash an extra Lightning attack.

skills.name: Griever
skills.description: Every time a target triggers the Shock state, DMG dealt by Kafka slightly increases.
